Package net.flioris.jva

Class JVA

java.lang.Object
net.flioris.jva.JVA
public class JVA extends Object
Provides methods to execute API requests and handles events.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    JVA(String accessToken, String groupId)
    Creates a new instance of the JVA bot with the specified access token and group ID.

  • Constructor Details

    • JVA

      public JVA(String accessToken, String groupId)
      Creates a new instance of the JVA bot with the specified access token and group ID.
      Parameters:
      accessToken - The access token used to authenticate API requests.
      groupId - The ID of the group the bot belongs to.

  • Method Details

    • setListeners

      public void setListeners(EventListener... listeners)
      Sets the event listeners that will handle incoming bot events.
      Parameters:
      listeners - The event listeners to be registered

    • getPhotosUploadServer

      public RestAction<String> getPhotosUploadServer(int peerId)
      Gets a photos upload server.
      Parameters:
      peerId - The ID of the user or conversation to which you want to upload a photo.
      Returns:
      Photos upload server.

    • getDocsUploadServer

      public RestAction<String> getDocsUploadServer()
      Gets a documents upload server (currently used for uploading group photos).
      Returns:
      Documents upload server.

    • uploadPhoto

      public RestAction<org.json.JSONObject> uploadPhoto(String uploadUrl, File photo)
      Uploads a photo.
      Parameters:
      uploadUrl - Just the response of the getPhotosUploadServer method.
      photo - The photo file to upload.
      Returns:
      uploadPhotoResponse.

    • uploadDocument

      public RestAction<org.json.JSONObject> uploadDocument(String uploadUrl, File photo)
      Uploads a document (currently used for uploading group photos).
      Parameters:
      uploadUrl - Just the response of the getDocsUploadServer method.
      photo - The photo file to upload.
      Returns:
      uploadDocumentResponse.

    • savePhoto

      public RestAction<org.json.JSONObject> savePhoto(org.json.JSONObject uploadResponse)
      Saves a photo.
      Parameters:
      uploadResponse - Just the response of the uploadPhoto method.
      Returns:
      savePhotoResponse.

    • saveDocument

      public RestAction<org.json.JSONObject> saveDocument(org.json.JSONObject uploadResponse)
      Saves a document (currently used for uploading group photos).
      Parameters:
      uploadResponse - Just the response of the uploadDocument method.
      Returns:
      saveDocumentResponse.

    • send

      public void send(int id, String message, File photo)
      Sends a message with text and a photo in a private message to a user or conversation.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user or conversation to which you want to post a message with text and a photo.
      message - The text that will be attached.
      photo - The photo that will be attached to the message.

    • post

      public void post(String message, File photo)
      Publishes a post with a photo and text on the wall of a bot group.
      Parameters:
      message - The text that will be attached.
      photo - The photo that will be attached.

    • post

      public void post(String message, org.json.JSONObject saveDocResponse)
      Publishes a post with a document and text on the wall of a bot group (currently used for uploading group photos).
      Parameters:
      message - The text that will be attached.
      saveDocResponse - Just the response of the saveDocument method.

    • send

      public void send(int id, String message)
      Sends a message in a private message to a user or conversation.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user or conversation to which you want to post to.
      message - The text that will be attached.

    • send

      public void send(int id, String message, org.json.JSONObject savePhotoResponse)
      Sends a message with text and a photo in a private message to a user or conversation.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user or conversation to which you want to post a message with text and an image.
      message - The text that will be attached.
      savePhotoResponse - Just the response of the savePhoto method.

    • reply

      public void reply(int id, String messageId, String message)
      Sends a response to a message in a private message to a user or to a conversation.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user or conversation to which you want to post a reply.
      messageId - The ID of the message you want to reply to.
      message - The text you want to reply with.

    • getConversationById

      public RestAction<Conversation> getConversationById(String conversationId)
      Returns the Conversation by its ID.
      Parameters:
      conversationId - The ID of the Conversation you want to receive.
      Returns:
      The Conversation with this ID. May return null.

    • getUserById

      public RestAction<User> getUserById(String userId)
      Returns the User by its ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the User you want to receive.
      Returns:
      The User with this ID. May return null.
